definition: to become excited with/to be enchanted by
to bewilder/crazy about/fan/enthusiast/lost/confused
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
see 上聲|上声[shang3 sheng1]

sentences.english: The minute she is hooked youwant to break rapport.
sentences.chinese: 她迷上你的那一刻就會想打破融洽。

sentences.english: But once I saw it, there was no going back.
sentences.chinese: 但是一旦我看到後，我就深深的迷上了。

sentences.english: I am really sold on these dishes.
Joe's on a soccer jag . It's all he ever talks about.
sentences.chinese: 喬迷上足球了，這段時間總談論。

sentences.english: If you find yourself hooked, do it again the next day.
sentences.chinese: 如果你發現自己迷上它了，第二天再來一次吧。

sentences.english: They agreed to say hello to each other every day through QQ, later XuSong crush on music.
sentences.chinese: 他們約定每天通過QQ彼此問好，後來許嵩迷上音樂。

sentences.english: Andrew has a crush on me. But jane likes john.
sentences.chinese: 安德魯愛上了簡，可是簡卻迷上了約翰。

sentences.english: Everyone in our family is hooked on the new TV show. We never miss an episode.
sentences.chinese: 我們家人人都迷上了這部新電視劇，一集也沒錯過。

sentences.english: This season he has become cricket-mad and he rejoined his swimming club.
sentences.chinese: 這個季節他迷上了板球，並重新加入了游泳俱樂部。

sentences.english: I'm kind of addict to the nature, so I drew those sketches!
sentences.chinese: 現在又迷上了大自然，於是畫了張動物的速寫。

sentences.english: When he hooked it, Zimmer didn't think it was a crappie.
sentences.chinese: 當他迷上它，齊默不認爲這是一個克拉皮。

sentences.english: Toral became fascinated with computers at a time when not many people owned them.
sentences.chinese: 在托拉爾迷上電腦的時候，還沒多少人擁有電腦。

sentences.english: If you look at the Indian Ocean, it's fascinating.
sentences.chinese: 如果你看一看印度洋，你就會迷上它。
最近我迷上網上聊天了。

sentences.english: They finally reached the fourth grade, fascinated to read the novel, it is what kind of crazy.
sentences.chinese: 終於上四年級，迷上看小說，很瘋狂的那一種。

sentences.english: These days Tom has been dabbling at painting.
sentences.chinese: 這一陣子湯姆迷上了畫畫。

definition: to be infatuated with/to be enchanted by/to be passionate about
to be engrossed/to be absorbed with/to lose oneself in/to be addicted to
to be keen on/to have a passion for
to be fascinated/to be captivated
infatuated/obsessed
once it gets started there's no stopping it
pinyin: yi1 fa1 bu4 ke3 shou1 shi5

definition: to be fascinated/to be enchanted
fashionable/popular
to get into a habit/to become addicted
to like/to be fond of
to fall in love with/to be in love with
to have a special fondness (for sth)
want to stop but can't (idiom)/to be unable to stop oneself/to feel an urge to continue
to treasure/to be very fond of
to be infatuated with
suddenly have a thought (idiom)/suddenly be inspired to do something
